tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DrugComparison (
  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  new_drug_outcome VARCHAR(100),
  established_treatment_outcome VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  drug_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  outcome_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
   patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Drug_Outcomes (
   outcome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   drug_id INT REFERENCES Drugs(drug_id),
   patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
   treatment_id INT REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id),
   outcome_description TEXT
);
